ActCanada Transportation Act
PrecisReappointment of SCOTT HUGH STREINER of Ottawa, Ontario, as a member of the Canadian Transportation Agency, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year; and his designation as Chairperson of the Canadian Transportation Agency, effective July 20, 2020.
